document.title: SP696-Considerations When Selecting a Commercial Squeeze Chute

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract: Producers considering the purchase of a commercial squeeze chute have a number of factors to consider before making the nal decision. A squeeze chute is a sizable investment for most producers. Since the squeeze chute plays such an important part in the management of the beef herd, it is critical that producers select the best available squeeze chute that will meet their needs. This is too great an investment for a critical mistake to be made in the selection process.
